From: "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@...>

OOC: Gomen Nasi

IC:   Skullgrin and Triggerhappy just got back to the Dark Avian, in time to
see Menasor split back into the Stunticons.

        "What in the pit just happened here?" Triggerhappy questioned,
entering the base along with Skullgrin.

        Skullgrin looked at the dead, crushed Slaughter.  He had a look of
disguts on his face.  Triggerhappy saw the dead Slaughter too.  Triggerhappy
spat oil and lubricant on Slaughter's remains.

        "Organics.......How disgusting......." Triggerhappy sneered.

        "Wish I coulda slagged 'im," Skullgrin said.

        Skullgrin spat on Slaughter's remains too.  He kind of stared at
Slaughter's crushed, busted head which was oozing out gushy blood and slime.
Skullgrin examined the dead pieces of Slaughter.  His eyes then struck
Slaughter's head again.  He looked at it for a few seconds, then whipped out
his gun and shot it.  The head exploded into pieces and the green blood and
guts and stuff sprayed everywhere.  A chunk of Slaughter's brain landed on
Skullgrin's chest, and slowly slid down a little...Skullgrin hated organics,
and so did Triggerhappy.  Alot of Decepticons hated organics.....
